response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards. It comes with a range of features designed to enhance your experience. Given its quality and the effort put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $100. However, to make this opportunity accessible, I'm offering it to you for an introductory price of $95. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll consider taking advantage of it.
